name: TypeHandler_createValueTest
description: Unit tests for the TypeHandler.createValue method with different types.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueWithClass
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Class object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueWithFile
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a File object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueWithURL
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a URL object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueWithInvalidInput
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of invalid input with TypeHandler.createValue, expecting a ParseException.
